```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Purpose

This script imports, summarizes, and shows basic visualizations of an individual's session data.

## Import

```{r}
this_session <- readr::read_csv(paste0(params$csv_path, params$data_fn))
names(this_session)
```

## Clean

Add a trial variable.

```{r}
this_session <- this_session %>%
  dplyr::mutate(., trial = 1:length(observer)[1])
```

Make correct/incorrect a factor for plotting.

```{r}
this_session <- this_session %>%
  dplyr::mutate(accuracy = factor(correct, labels = c("incorrect", "correct")))
```

## Visualize

```{r}
this_session %>%
  ggplot(.) +
  aes(x = trial, y = stim_secs) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
```
